sourcesContent: import React from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { Card } from 'react-bootstrap' import Rating from './Rating' const Product = ({ product }) => { return ( <> {product.isPublished ? ( {product.name} ${product.price} ) : null} ) } export default Product
